name: chronotir
description: Controlador para tiradas de tiro con arco

scripts.uglify: mkdir -p public/js/ && rm -rf public/js/* && npx uglifyjs build/bundle.js --compress > public/js/main.js
scripts.typescript: mkdir -p build/js && rm -rf build/js/* && tsc -p ts/
scripts.build: npm run typescript && npm run bundle && npm run uglify

author: kanales
